dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
dependent_to.name: geopm-service

dependent_to.description:
An extension to python's argparse which simplifies parsing of
configuration options from command line arguments, json configuration
files (yaml or jsonnet supersets), environment variables and hard-coded
defaults.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonargparse

description: Parse Python docstrings in reST, Google and Numpydoc format.
name: py-docstring-parser

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
